name: rentalizer
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool airdna.
Tool description: API for Short-Term Rental Data Analytics | Vrbo & Airbnb Data | Rentalizer
API description: Fetches rental property data for a given address from the AirDNA Rentalizer API.

address.description: The address of the property for which rental data is required.

bathrooms.description: The number of bathrooms in the property. Defaults to 2.

accommodates.description: The number of people the property can accommodate. Defaults to '2'.

bedrooms.description: The number of bedrooms in the property. Defaults to 2.

currency.description: The preferred currency for financial data.
